system.description:
Through care, practice, and meditation you have drawn magic from your soul and distant realms, focused through runic scarring and mystical tattooing. As you cast spells, scars and tattoos on your body may disappear, only to return later when you recover your spell points.

Starting at 1st level, you gain the ability to cast spells through pact magic, even though you may not necessarily have a patron. This feature is identical to the warlock pact magic feature with the following changes:

  • You use the Runespell Rager table to determine how many spells and cantrips you know, what level you can cast spells, and how many spell points you have.

  • You use the runespell rager spell list instead of the warlock spell list.
